Author: arilupe

Comment: \> They thought they would have all the power in deciding.     Yeah, that's what women thought too; that they had the power to decide when/if to have kids.  The LGBTQ+ community thought they had the power to decide who they were and who they could love. Voters thought they had the power to decide on their leaders, their religion (if any), their education and justice system. That's before those in power decided they wanted to make all the big decisions (and the small ones too) The power in deciding is pretty well the difference between democracy and authoritarianism. It's so fucking crazy that if I said that out loud, too many people would look at me like I'm crazy. Those not paying attention are in for a very rude awakening, I fear.
Author: __dilligaf__
